short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Business-class Texting Software - Start texting directly from your CRM, ATS or any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Business text messaging software that increases engagement and improves communication with customers, candidates, and employees. 

We've moved to a new and improved Chrome extension. To continue enjoying all the features you love, with an updated look and feel, please download our latest version from the link below:

Download the new TextUs Chrome extension here:
https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/textus-chrome-extension/hjnjkiddcmpamechmdjonecfjckboean

Thank you for your support and for making this transition with us. We can't wait to see you on the new extension!
